item.title: Exploring AWS Application Discovery Service üîç
item.description: AWS Application Discovery Service Introduction AWS Discovery Agent is an AWS software that is deployed in any targeted servers like physical on-premises servers, Amazon EC2 instances, and virtual machines for discovery and migration. It captures information like system configuration, system performance, running processes, and details of the network connections between systems. This agent required root privileges to collect the information. When you start the Discovery Agent, it registers with the Application Discovery Service endpoint, arsenal.
